sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AjaxResourceManagementUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AjaxResourceManagementUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AjaxResourceManagementUtil = Class.create();
AjaxResourceManagementUtil.prototype =
    Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
        initialize: function(request, responseXML, gc) {
            global.AbstractAjaxProcessor.prototype.initialize.call(this, request, responseXML, gc);
			this.rmHelper = new RMUIActionHelper();
        },
        getTaskFromResourcePlan: function() {
            var resource_plan_id = this.getParameter('resource_plan_id');
            var rp = new GlideRecord('resource_plan');
			if(!rp.canRead()) return null;
            rp.get(resource_plan_id);
            return rp.getValue("task");
        },

        extendResourceAllocations: function() {
            var resource_plan_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_resourcePlanId');
			if(!this.rmHelper.canExtendResourcePlan()) return;
            var rp = new ResourcePlanExtension();
            rp.get(resource_plan_id);
            rp.extendResourceAllocations();
            return;
        },

        completeExtendedPlan: function() {
            var resource_plan_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_resourcePlanId');
			if(!this.rmHelper.canCompleteExtension()) return;
            var rp = new GlideRecord("resource_plan");
            rp.get(resource_plan_id);
            rp.setValue("extension", "completed");
            rp.update();
            return;
        },

        requestToExtendPlan: function() {
            var resource_plan_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_resourcePlanId');
			if(!this.rmHelper.canRequestExtension()) return;
            var rp = new GlideRecord("resource_plan");
            rp.get(resource_plan_id);
            rp.setValue("extension", "requested");
            rp.update();
            return;
        },

        getDefaultGroupResourceForUser: function() {
            var requestedUserResource = this.getParameter('sysparm_id');
            var groups = [];
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
            if (!gr.canRead()) return null;
            gr.addQuery('user', requestedUserResource);
            gr.addQuery('group.roles', 'pps_resource');
            gr.query();
            while (gr.next())
                groups.push(gr.getValue('group'));
            return JSON.stringify(groups);
        },

        getDailyGenerationProperty: function() {
            return (new ResourceManagementProperties().getPropertyToGenerateDailyAggregates());
        },

        type: 'AjaxResourceManagementUtil'
    });]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-07-10 21:14:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>07436ba08f220100b749b9f537bdeec8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AjaxResourceManagementUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_07436ba08f220100b749b9f537bdeec8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-08 09:58:19</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
